metadata.title: CVE-2018-14048 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
An issue has been found in libpng 1.6.34. It is a SEGV in the functionpng_free_data in png.c, related to the recommended error handling forpng_read_image.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14048` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpng12-0 - 1.2.54-1ubuntu1.1+esm1
libpng3 - 1.2.54-1ubuntu1.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

libpng16-16 - 1.6.20-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
libpng16-tools - 1.6.20-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libpng package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.54-1ubuntu1.1+esm1').
